project_abstract.cdata: The project is an important element in the Government's policy to double coal output to 1,200 million tonnes per year (mtpy) by the year 2000. The project is the first of a series of large-scale, fully mechanized coal mining operations in the country. It will contribute to: (a) increasing coal production by about 4.5 mtpy by the early 1990s; (b) transferring technology in mine design, engineering and construction (especially the highly productive, mechanized longwall exploitation technology); (c) introducing modern coal washing technology; and (d) fostering improved management techniques for project scheduling, monitoring and cost control. The project will finance: (a) construction of the Changcun mine, including vertical shafts, underground roadways, and longwall faces; (b) construction of a coal preparation plant; (c) equipment for coal extraction, washery and loadout operations; and (d) surface infrastructure including a railway spur line, an electrical substation, water supply lines, workshops, and warehouses.

P003434.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>常村煤炭项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>为实现到2000年年底前煤炭年产量翻番（达到12亿吨）的目标，中国政府制定了一项政策，本项目即是该政策的一项重要内容。中国拥有一系列大型煤炭综采工程，本项目即是其中的首个工程，将推动：（1）（二十世纪）九十年代初期之前煤炭产量每年增长约450万吨；（2）转让煤矿设计、工程和施工方面的技术（尤其是生产效率和综采程度高的长壁开采技术）；（3）引进现代洗煤技术；（4）培育项目计划制定、监测和成本控制方面的良好管理方法。项目资助以下内容：（1）建设常村煤矿，包括竖井、地下通道和长壁综采工作面；（2）建设一家选煤厂；（3）提供煤炭开采、清洗和外运设备；（4）建设地面基础设施，包括一条铁路支线、一座变电站、供水管线、车间和仓库。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
P003434.docty: Project Completion Report,Memorandum & Recommendation of the President,Staff Appraisal Report
